name: scythed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
scythe
[ T ] to cut something using a scythe
[ I + adv/prep ] to move very quickly through a group of people or things: The racing car left the track at 120 mph and scythed through the crowd of spectators, killing ten.
